home.subParagraph3: helps you design a professional resume, even if you're not very smart.

header.title: Design your resume
header.subtitle: Follow the steps below to create your resume. Your progress will be saved automatically.

GeneralInfo.title: General info
GeneralInfo.subtitle: This will not appear on your resume.
GeneralInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: A resume for my next job
GeneralInfo.describe: Describe What this resume is for.

WorkExperience.title: Work experience
WorkExperience.subtitle: Add as many work experiences as you like.
WorkExperience.dateMessage3: empty if you are currently working here.

Education.title: Education
Education.subtitle: Add as many educations as you like.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.subtitle: What are you good at?
Skills.textareaMessage: Separate each skill with a comma.
Skills.placeholder: e.g. marketing, web developer, graphic design, ...

Summary.title: Professional summary
Summary.subtitle: Write a short introduction for your resume.
Summary.placeholder: A brief, engaging text about yourself

Languages.title: Languages
Languages.subtitle: Add as many languages as you like.

Project.title: Projects
Project.subtitle: Add as many projects as you like.

errors.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

resumeItem.dialogDescription: This will permanently delete this resume. This action cannot be undone.
